occupations.title: Welder, Gas
occupations.description: Gas Welder joins metal parts by fusion welding process in which the edges of metals to be joined are heated to molten condition at temperature of around 3200 degree C by a gas flame.

occupations.title: Automotive Mechanic
occupations.description: Automotive Mechanic repairs overhauls and services motor vehicles to keep them in good running condition. Examines vehicle to ascertain nature and location of defects either by running engine or driving vehicle on road.

occupations.title: Tailor
occupations.description: Tailor cuts, sews, alters, repairs garments like coats, suits, trousers, shirts and dresses according to customer specifications and measurements.

occupations.title: Electrician General
occupations.description: Electrician General installs, maintains and repairs electrical machinery equipment and fittings in factories, workshops power house, business and residential premises etc.

occupations.title: Nurse, General
occupations.description: Nurse, General provides nursing care to patients in hospital, nursing home or at home. Takes patient temperature, pulse, respiration and blood pressure, administers prescribed medicines.

occupations.title: Data Entry Operator
occupations.description: Data Entry Operator enters data into computer system from source documents using keyboard, optical scanner or data recorder. Verifies accuracy of data entered.

occupations.title: Teacher, Primary School
occupations.description: Teacher, Primary School teaches one or more subjects to students at primary level and develops their knowledge and understanding of subjects through classroom teaching.

occupations.title: Farm Worker
occupations.description: Farm Worker performs variety of tasks on farms such as planting, cultivating, harvesting crops, and feeding livestock under supervision.

occupations.title: Carpenter, General
occupations.description: Carpenter, General makes, assembles, alters and repairs various types of wooden articles and structures such as doors, windows, furniture, roof trusses according to specifications.

occupations.title: Driver, Light Motor Vehicle
occupations.description: Driver, Light Motor Vehicle drives motor cars, jeeps, vans and other light motor vehicles to transport passengers or light cargo.

occupations.title: Security Guard
occupations.description: Security Guard watches over and protects property, maintains order, and enforces regulations at establishments. Patrols assigned areas and checks doors, windows and gates.

occupations.title: Cook, General
occupations.description: Cook, General prepares and cooks food in hotels, restaurants, clubs, canteens and other establishments. Plans menus, prepares and cooks foodstuffs.

occupations.title: Cleaner, Office
occupations.description: Office Cleaner keeps offices, buildings and establishments clean and tidy. Sweeps, mops and polishes floors, dusts furniture, empties waste bins and ensures washrooms are clean.
